Package cams.repliable

Class Enquiry

java.lang.Object
cams.repliable.Repliable
cams.repliable.Enquiry
public class Enquiry extends Repliable
The Enquiry class represents an inquiry made by a student. It extends the Repliable class, inheriting functionality related to replies. Each enquiry has a question and can have a corresponding reply. The student making the inquiry is associated with this enquiry.
Since:
2023-11-09
Version:
1.0
Author:
Gillbert Susilo Wong, Juan Frederick, Karl Devlin Chau, Pascalis Pandey, Trang Nguyen
